item.title: Heading to PyData
item.description:
So I am one of the lucky few from the Engineering team @ Chango chosen to go and check out PyData down in San Francisco!

Our lead large scale data architect/senior VP of dealing with epic amounts of data Tim Spurway (@t1m) will be giving a talk on Hustle tomorrow â€¦
item.dc:creator: Tait Clarridge

item.title: Posts Incoming
item.description:
Well, it is time for me to embrace github and stop using a hosted environment for my tiny tech blog.

Over the coming days I will be porting the necessary things over and adding new thoughts and ideas.
item.dc:creator: Tait Clarridge
